entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Interpreter assertion in `JIT/Methodical/NaN/r4NaNconv_il_r/r4NaNconv_il_r.sh`- `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:5917` #65681
  • A delay is necessary when ECDSA-signing data with smart cards #65680
  • NTAuthentication.MakeSignature produces different thing on macOS, Windows and Linux #65678
  • [API Proposal]: make interface of Array and List classes more uniform #65677
  • coreclr build crashes on Linux with newest clang 13 #65676
  • Assertion failed 'lclVarType != TYP_UNDEF' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #65674
  • RyuJIT: IR Tree matching APIs #65673
    Future
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Loader.Tests` fail when run in randomized order #65672
  • [wasm] `System.Numerics.Tests.cast_toTest.RunDoubleExplicitCastToBigIntegerTests` fails with randomized test order #65671
  • [wasm][debugger] Support optional parameters in external methods #65670
  • "CoreCLR Pri0 Runtime Tests Run windows arm64 checked" leg timed out #65667
  • GZipCompressor implemented in netstandard2.0 package not working in .NETFramework4.8 #65665
  • VS debugger hangs when clicking on any button in WinformsControlsTest #65664
  • How to hot reload assemblies in mono runtime #65663
  • Serialization of abstract properties #65662
  • [API Proposal]: Activity.HasRemoteParent (and problematic docs for Activity.Parent) #65660
  • Please Introduce Specifier for Task to run it in P or L Core. #65659
  • x86: FramePointerRequiredEH is still set even if JIT removed empty try/finally #65658
    Future
  • Finally blocks not always ran on thrown exception #65657
  • [API Proposal]: Asynchronous DI support #65656
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.ZLibStreamUnitTests.Dispose_ClosesStream(disposeMode: 1) #65650
  • Test failure WindowsIdentityImpersonatedTests.RunImpersonated_NameResolution #65648
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\inl\\caninline_ro\\caninline_ro.cmd #65647
  • Tes failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse3\\LoadDquVector128_r\\LoadDquVector128_r.cmd #65646
  • Test failure profiler\\unittest\\metadatagetdispenser\\metadatagetdispenser.cmd #65645
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Bmi1.X64\\Bmi1.X64_r\\Bmi1.X64_r.cmd #65643

Closed

  • Type.IsPublic returns wrong answer for pointer and byref types #12355
    7.0.0
  • Extra file exist check in FileSystem.MoveDirectory on Unix #58240
    7.0.0
  • Libraries like HttpClient use legacy activity creation, requiring hacks in OpenTelemetry SDK #63868
    7.0.0
  • Can a File Stream open a File Larger than 5 Terabytes? #65602
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.DeflateStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success #65649
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64909
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure all expected paths are logged on test failure #65666
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Ad-Hoc codesign on macOS-arm64 for crossgen2 binaries #65661
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Reenable ILStrip task on CI #65651
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement HttpTelemetry for HTTP/3 #65644
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Add support for a random test case orderer, for xunit tests #65628
    arch-wasm
  • Fix PGO jobs on official builds #65669
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move more things out of Internal/Cryptography #65393
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: revise approach for x64 OSR epilogs #65609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix liveness for dead non-removable partial definitions #65618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup CLRConfig #65655
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always build ref pack even in servicing releases #65579
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move iOS/tvOS simulator and Android emulator legs from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix several casing mismatches causing failures on Unix #65639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow to run tests for internal AzDo PRs #65603
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Suppress some new trimmer warnings #65580
    linkable-framework
  • Slightly relax file pattern for copying native components #65640
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65536
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add per-test ids, and save logs to files for the test, and proxy messages #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Faster vector == Vector128.Zero on arm64 #65632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Added OnesComplement, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added support of atomic writes for custom value types #65635
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [WIP] [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-ILVerification, Future
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [NO MERGE] SHM_NAME_MAX #64752
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #65329
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup platform-specific ifdefs #65624
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65328
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Loc]With .NET 7 SDK, the description about "--disable-build-servers" is unlocalized when running "dotnet build --help" in CLI on locale OS. #24040
  • Unlisted packages are still installed via `dotnet tool install` without `--version` despite correctly not showing up in `dotnet tool search` #24037

Closed

  • Trailing \ or / will fail for path parameters for `dotnet test` #23970
  • self-contained warning should be suppressed for iOS #23705
    6.0.3xx

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add docs for workloads #23895
  • Fix escaping function when argument ends with odd number of backslashes #23988
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Enable artifacts post processing #24035
    Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • [WorkloadInstall] Simplify code workload install command line #24028
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1624232 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Incorrect "Expression is always false" with `long.operator %` #59680
  • IOperation support for list patterns #57194
    17.2
  • Test plan for lambda improvements #52192
    17.2
  • switch expression returns double on int, long, float condition #59651
    17.2
  • Backslach in interpolated raw string literal #59670
  • Improve error messages for Json StringSyntaxAttribute #59641
  • StringSyntax doesn't recognize {params} arrays, collection initializers, etc. #59645

Updated

  • MacOS Failure to Restore with signature validation issue #58202
    17.1
  • InitializeToolset flakiness in correctness builds #58199
    17.1
  • NuGet.Protocol.Core.Types.FatalProtocolException exception in helix work items #58197
    17.1
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.ArgumentParsing is flaky #58077
  • Failure in CSharpCodeActions.GFUFuzzyMatchAfterRenameTrackingAndAfterGenerateType #57423
  • CI build fails due to Azure package feed error 503 (Service Unavailable) #57565
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    17.2
  • Timeout on Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.CSharp.UnitTests.dll tests #55638
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    17.2
  • Roslyn Produces Abnormally High CPU Utilization When Many Files Are Open #57525
    17.2
  • EditorConfig UI enhancements #53171
    17.2
  • Intellisense Return Value Documentation #31618
    Backlog
  • Refactor: move static method to other class #33928
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Improve json error message in particular case #59650
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not try to check for escapes in an interpolated raw string literal #59676
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Lightup embedded languages inside collections marked with StringSyntax #59648
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59678
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Improve PDB source document project handling #59643
    Area-IDE
  • Global ide analyzer options #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature to fixup code when user transposes 'record' in a declaration #59652
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Show constant value of binary operators in QuickInfo #30482
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Community
  • [DRAFT] Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add GetMultipleFiles() method to InputFileChangeEventArgs and specify exceptions thrown. #40341
  • Duplicate scopes sent to IdP for OIDC authentication from WebAssembly #40340
  • Investigate using WebSocketStream in SignalR browser JS client #40339
  • Unable to run TestServer requests in parallel #40337
  • Blazor server DelegatingHandler for http client causing JavaScript error with prerendering disabled #40336
    Backlog
  • SDK 6.0.200 breaks Blazor projects in Azure DevOps Visual Studio build task #40333
  • BLAZOR WASM - ADFS - OIDC - Documentation #40331
  • When adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing to test project, dotnet publish --no-build command fails with NETSDK1085 #40330
  • Create 6.0 BlazorWebAssemblyApp project with the command and run the "dotnet publish" command, for the first time meet error:'MSB4018: The "GetFileHash" task failed unexpectedly'. #40328
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cant use asp-for tag helpers with nullable model #40327
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • MarkupString not working and encode character & #40141
  • CacheTagHelper <cache> works for other elements but not for a particular view component? #40187
  • OnInitialized not being called for component inside RenderFragment after StateHasChanged on parent #40329
  • blazor wasm using new Claim("roles", role) cause @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "admin")] not work #40314
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor WASM Environnement issue #40146
  • Razor view CSS isolation does not support HTML header tag #40151
  • Similar to MarkupString but for custom components. #40311
  • Cannot Inject ApplicationUser into Controller .NET CORE6 #40117
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Add LinkerTest project #40342
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0e40217` to `c9461a9` #40332
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921 #40321
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Added reference to the Deveel's MongoDB #40323
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add a switch to defer rendering of components in ComponentTagHelper #40316
    area-blazor
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Input components two way binding #40234
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker elements that overlap the top bar cannot be clicked/Top-level Pickers overlap top bar by default #4821
  • [android] ImageButton.CornerRadius operates in DP #4819
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding "No DataContext found for Binding", yet it still works properly #4818
  • [ios] Cant set TabbedPage BarBackgroundColor in iOS 15 #4814
  • [Webview] Solution for JS Bridge #4813
  • The "Value cannot be null" errors are shown on an attempt to build a project with MauiVersion set to a previous value #4812
  • [Webview/Android] blank screen when website have invalid certificate #4811
  • Consider allowing inheritance from the built-in handlers when creating custom controls #4810
  • [Android] TableView doesn't respond to click after first use/navigation #4809
  • Pending code to port from Renderers to Handlers #4808
  • HTML5 video not working on MAUI Blazor App #4807
  • Label MaxLines doesn't work #4805
  • Incorrect Frame behavior on WinUI such as shadow, margin, content position, corner radius, etc. #4804
  • Not rendering FlyoutContentTemplate #4801

Closed

  • The project doesn't know how to run the profile Windows Machine. #4797
  • Renaming all things Native --> Platform #4451
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Spec] Should BorderWidth be converted to Thickness? #2256
  • Multilingual App Toolkit without the nagging Android bug #1780
  • [Bug] Invoking Shapes API throws System.DllNotFoundException on WinUI. #2463
  • Maui.Android debugger is not working correctly Net6 (RC1) #2550
  • [Bug] Enter does not work in the editor #3097
  • [Bug] Date and Time pickers keyboard typing should not work #3131
  • Sometimes Password Entry Throw 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values' #3834
  • which version will support .NET MAUI for Visual Studio for Mac #4806
  • [Bug] Exception thrown: 'System.TypeLoadException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #2961
  • ToolbarItem is not appearing #4157

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert dp to px when setting ImageButton.CornerRadius #4820
  • [iOS] Implement pending custom WKWebKitDelegate in WebViewHandler #4817
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-webview
  • [Windows] Detect when image failed to load in Windows ImageButton #4816
    platform/windows 🪟, control-button
  • [Android] Update the DatePicker Dialog if the display info changes #4815
    platform/android 🤖, control-datetimepicker

Updated

  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Update ImageHandler and ImageButtonHandler to current conventions #4784
  • Refactor SecureStorage into an interface #4668
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Essentials.Gyroscope refactored to interface and singleton #4649
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.WebAuthenticator refactored to interface and singleton #4757
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials.OrientationSensor refactored to interface and singleton #4662
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Geolocation refactored to interface and singleton #4634
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Blazor Android/Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqliteParameter.SqliteType throws InvalidOperationException for DateOnly/TimeOnly #27484
  • How to configure an entity property's generated sql to be a subquery or call to UDF? #27482
  • Left join on a sub-query with a left join changes the subquery's joins to inner joins #27480

Created

Updated

    waiting-for-response

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Remove MAUI manifests for now #13247
